original_text:
For according to the work of a man he will repay him,
    and according to his ways he will make it befall him.
korean_text: 사람의 행위를 따라 갚으사 각각 그의 행위대로 받게 하시나니

sentences.original_text: For according to the work of a man he will repay him
and according to his ways he will make it befall him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 길대로 그에게 그대로 되게 하리라
